fields.name: Literally Just A Cat (Passive):
fields.value: No investigations will expose you as an evil role or alignment. You will instead read as a random but consistent role from the Cats faction. You will be told this role at the beginning of the game.

fields.name: Bad Luck (Passive):
fields.value: Any player who shares an HN with you will have their vote secretly not count the following day phase.

fields.name: Answers To The Name Of (Passive):
fields.value: Each evening, any message in HNs that mentions you by username or a nickname of some sort will be recorded by the host. These messages will be pasted without attribution or context into your evening feedback.

fields.name: Shadow (2x):
fields.value: Choose to accompany anyone (including yourself) during their night visit. Neither of your visits will be recognized by investigations.

fields.name: Seeing Things (1x, 70%):
fields.value: Choose a target, and write fake night feedback to give them.
